com.linecorp.armeria.client

Class ClientOptionsBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.client.ClientOptionsBuilder

  • public final class ClientOptionsBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a new ClientOptions using the builder pattern.
    See Also:
    ClientBuilder

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClientOptionsBuilder()
      Creates a new instance with the default options.
      ClientOptionsBuilder(ClientOptions options)
      Creates a new instance with the specified base options.
